column4: Annual average PM2.5 concentration in 2023 (in µg/m³)
column5: Potential gain in life expectancy from reducing PM2.5 concentrations from 2023 levels to WHO PM2.5 guideline of 5 µg/m³
column6: Potential gain in life expectancy from reducing PM2.5 concentrations from 2023 levels to Indonesia's national standard of 15 µg/m³
